arts.ttl: Valentino Livramento to Man City: Newcastle boss Eddie Howe makes feelings clear on transfer rumours
arts.sum: Newcastle United manager Eddie Howe responds to speculation linking right-back Valentino Livramento with a transfer to Manchester City.

Real Valladolid will be desperate to bounce back after a heavy 7-1 defeat away to Athletic Club in their previous game, meaning they remain rock bottom of La Liga. Valladolid have lost six league gam...
